title: Email Trigger (IMAP)
description: Triggers the workflow when a new email is received

postProcessAction.description: What to do after the email has been received. If "nothing" gets selected it will be processed multiple times.

downloadAttachments.description: Whether attachments of emails should be downloaded. Only set if needed as it increases processing.

format.description: The format to return the message in
x-enumDescriptions: Returns the full email message data with body content in the raw field as a base64url encoded string; the payload field is not used
Returns the full email with all data resolved and attachments saved as binary data
Returns the full email; do not use if you wish to gather inline attachments

dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"

customEmailConfig.description: Custom email fetching rules. See node-imap's search function for more details.

forceReconnect.description: Sets an interval (in minutes) to force a reconnection

trackLastMessageId.description: Whether to fetch only new emails since the last run, or all emails that match the "Custom Email Rules" (["UNSEEN"] by default)
